assignments.name: Add_records_questions_to_a_collection
assignments.label: Add records questions to a collection

formulas.name: CurrentUserID
formulas.expression: {!$User.Id}

formulas.name: Q10_Load_line_drip_containment_maintained
formulas.expression: "Load line drip containment is well maintained?"

formulas.name: Q11_Bulk_lube_oil_fuel
formulas.expression: "Bulk lube oil, fuel or oil-based chemical tanks > 55 gals have sufficient secondary containment?"

formulas.name: Q12_Secondary_containment_for_bulk_lube
formulas.expression: "Secondary containment for bulk lube oil, fuel or oil-based chemical tanks is free of oil or long standing water?"

formulas.name: Q13_Drip_pans_for_bulk_lube
formulas.expression: "Drip pans for bulk lube oil, fuel or oil-based chemical tanks are free of cracks, holes, corrosion, etc.?"

formulas.name: Q14_Flowline_is_free_of_leaks_Id
formulas.expression: "Flowline is free of leaks?"

formulas.name: Q15_Wellhead_Pumping_well_units
formulas.expression: "Wellhead / Pumping well units / polish rod / Hi/Lo pressure shutdown are free of leaks and in working condition?"

formulas.name: Q16_Other_oil_filled_equipmen
formulas.expression: "Other oil-filled equipment (transformers, engines, hydraulic systems, etc.) are free of leaks?"

formulas.name: Q17_Compressor_oil_leaks_Id
formulas.expression: "Compressor oil leaks are being contained within compressor base?"

formulas.name: Q18_Tank_labels_are_present_ID
formulas.expression: "Tank labels are present, accurate and in good condition?"

formulas.name: Q1_All_equipment
formulas.expression: "All equipment (tanks, vessels, engines, etc.) shown on facility diagram is accurate for size and location?"

formulas.name: Q2_Firewall_Catchment_Tertiary_containment
formulas.expression: "Firewall/Catchment(Tertiary containment) basins are free of oil, oil staining or long standing water?"

formulas.name: Q3_Bermed_area_is_Free_ID
formulas.expression: "Bermed area is free of live crude oil, condensate, or long standing water?"

formulas.name: Q4_Berm_and_catchment_basin
formulas.expression: "Berm and catchment basin drains are capped or plugged?"

formulas.name: Q5_Tank_Vessel_foundations_are_structurally
formulas.expression: "Tank / Vessel foundations are structurally sound: Free of cracks, erosion, pitting or other damage?"

formulas.name: Q6_Tanks_Vessels_are_free_of_leaks
formulas.expression: "Tanks / Vessels are free of leaks or signs of overflow due to instrumentation failure?"

formulas.name: Q7_Valves_piping_flanges
formulas.expression: "Valves, piping, flanges, hatches, pumps or fittings are free of leaks?"

formulas.name: Q8_Piping_and_pipe_supports_are_free
formulas.expression: "Piping and pipe supports are free of heavy corrosion?"

formulas.name: Q9_Load_lines_are_capped_or_plugged
formulas.expression: "Load lines are capped or plugged?"

formulas.name: Q_All_dikes_ID
formulas.expression: "All dikes/berms/trenches are in good condition and have not been altered from the facility diagram?"

recordCreates.name: Create_SPCC_Inspection_Form_from_ID
recordCreates.label: Create SPCC Inspection Form from ID

recordCreates.label: Create SPCC Inspection Form from RecordID
